resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114833</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114833</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Percentage transmission of light through an optical fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prozentsatzübertragung des Lichtes durch eine 
optische Faser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission de pourcentage de lumière par une 
fibre optique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão da porcentagem da luz através de uma
fibra ótica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione di percentuale di luce attraverso una
fibra ottica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάδοση ποσοστού του φωτός μέσω μιας οπτικής ίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión del porcentaje de la luz a través 
de una fibra óptica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the relationship between the intensity of transmitted light and wavelength. This is shown for different cases where reduction effects are due to glass bonds, Rayleigh scattering  and hydroxyl ion impurities.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydroxyl ion impurities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rayleigh scattering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt das Verhältnis 
zwischen der Intensität des übertragenen Lichtes und Wellenlänge. 
Dieses wird für unterschiedliche Fälle gezeigt, in denen 
Verkleinerung Effekte an an den Glasbindungen, Rayleigh dem Zerstreuen
und an den Hydroxylionenverunreinigungen liegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre le rapport entre 
l'intensité de la lumière transmise et la longueur d'onde. 
Ceci est montré pour différents cas où les effets de 
réduction sont dus aux obligations, à la dispersion de Rayleigh et 
aux impuretés de verre d'ion d'hydroxyle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra o relacionamento entre 
a intensidade da luz transmitida e o wavelength. Isto é 
mostrado para os casos diferentes onde os efeitos da redução são  
devido às ligações, a dispersar de Rayleigh e às impurezas de 
vidro do íon do hydroxyl.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra il rapporto fra 
l'intensità di luce trasmessa e la lunghezza d'onda. Ciò è 
indicata per i casi differenti dove gli effetti di riduzione sono 
dovuto i legami, la dispersione di Rayleigh e le impurità di vetro 
dello ione dell'idrossile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη σχέση 
μεταξύ της έντασης του διαβιβασθέντος φωτός και του μήκους 
κύματος. Αυτό εμφανίζεται για τις διαφορετικές περιπτώσεις 
όπου τα αποτελέσματα μείωσης οφείλονται στους δεσμούς γυαλιού, 
τη διασπορά Rayleigh και τις ιονικές ακαθαρσίες υδροξυλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra el lazo entre la 
intensidad de la luz transmitida y la longitud de onda. Esto se 
muestra para diversos casos donde están los efectos de la reducción 
debido a los enlaces, a la dispersión de Rayleigh y a impurezas de 
cristal del ion del oxhidrilo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glasbindungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hydroxylionenverunreinigungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Übertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Faser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rayleigh Zerstreuen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">obligations de verre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">impuretés d'ion d'hydroxyle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transmission légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fibre optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispersion de Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueur d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ligações do vidro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">impurezas do íon do hydroxyl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fibra ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dispersar de Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legami di vetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">impurità dello ione dell'idrossile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trasmissione della luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibra ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dispersione di Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεσμοί γυαλιού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιονικές ακαθαρσίες υδροξυλίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά μετάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική ίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασπορά Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκος κύματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">impurezas del ion del oxhidrilo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">transmisión ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fibra óptica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dispersión de Rayleigh</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud de onda</string>
          </keyword>
